ygData.subject: Abashi responds to the lullaby thread
ygData.msgSnippet: Snipped from the Concert Hall board.  No URL was given. I spoke to Geoff about the original author s tests. It looks like there might be *something* strange
ygData.messageBody:
Snipped from the Concert Hall board. No URL was given.

I spoke to Geoff about the original author's tests. It looks like there might be
*something* strange going on, but we'll have to run some more tests in House.
Geoff will take another look at it after he gets done with the first draft of
the expansion spells in the next few days.
-Gordon

Perhaps we're finally gonna see some corrective action on this. I sure hope GZ
contacts either John Kim or Rokenn so one of them can explain the facts on this
issue to him directly.

Galtin of E'ci
